name: Firelight Guardian Seal
text: You can Ritual Summon this card with a "Firelight" card. This card's level is treated as 4 in the hand whilst you have 2 "Firelight" monsters in your Pendulum Zones. You can only use each of the following effects of "Firelight Guardian Seal" once per turn. If this card is Special Summoned: You can target any number of Ritual monsters you control; destroy them, then, destroy cards your opponent controls equal to the number destroyed. Any battle damage inflicted to your opponent is halved the turn you activate this effect. If this card is destroyed by battle or another card's effect: You can immediately after this effect resolves, Link Summon 1 "The Firelight" by banishing 4 "Firelight" monsters with different names from your Extra Deck face-up as Link Material.
pendulum_text: Monsters your opponent controls lose 100 ATK for each "Firelight" monster you control. During your Main Phase: You can Ritual Summon 1 Level 8 or lower "Firelight" monster from your hand or face-up Extra Deck, then destroy this card. You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Firelight" monsters. This effect cannot be negated.
